dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
dbxrefs.title: External resources

items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
items.title: External identifier

schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions

items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.
items.title: Alternate Accession

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type

description.description: A plain text description of the dataset.
description.title: Description

internal_tags.description: Some datasets are part of particular data collections
internal_tags.title: Internal tags

date_released.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned whe the object is releaesd.
date_released.title: Date released

description: Schema for submitting metadata for a functional characterization assay.
title: Functional characterization experiment

target_expression_percentile.comment: Only functional characterization assays with target can specify target expression percentile.

target_expression_range_maximum.comment: Only functional characterization assays with target can specify target expression range.

target_expression_range_minimum.comment: Only functional characterization assays with target can specify target expression range.

comment: A functional characterization experiment is a special case of dataset. It includes assay metadata, replicate information and data files.

___supersedes.description: The functional characterization experiment(s) that this functional characterization experiment supersedes by virtue of being newer, better etc. than the one(s) it supersedes.
___supersedes.title: Supersedes

items.comment: See functional_characterization_experiment.json for a list of available identifiers.

___target.description: For assays, such as CRISPR screen, the name of the gene whose expression or product is under investigation for the functional characterization experiment.
___target.title: Target

___target_expression_range_maximum.description: Target expression read-out range maximum percentage value
___target_expression_range_maximum.title: Target expression range maximum

___target_expression_percentile.description: Target expression read-out expressed as a percentile
___target_expression_percentile.title: Target expression percentile

___control_type.description: The specific type of control if the experiment is a control.
___control_type.title: Control type

___possible_controls.description: Dataset that contain files that can serve as scientific controls for this functional characterization experiment.
___possible_controls.title: Controls

items.description: A dataset that contains files that can serve as a scientific control for this functional characterization experiment.
items.comment: See dataset.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: Control

___target_expression_range_minimum.description: Target expression read-out range minimum percentage value
___target_expression_range_minimum.title: Target expression range minimum

___date_submitted.description: The date that the experiment received all required replicates and files
___date_submitted.comment: Do not submit. date_submitted will be assigned only by DCC personnel.
___date_submitted.title: Date submitted

___elements_references.description: Datasets that contain reference files listing the elements being characterized in this functional characterization experiment.
___elements_references.title: Elements references

items.description: Dataset that contain reference file or annotation listing the elements being characterized in this functional characterization experiment.
items.comment: See reference.json or annotation.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: Reference

___assay_term_name.description: OBI (Ontology for Biomedical Investigations) ontology term for the assay.
___assay_term_name.title: Assay name

___elements_mapping.description: A functional characterization experiment that contains mapping of elements being characterized to barcodes.
___elements_mapping.comment: See FunctionalCharacterizationExperiment.json for a list of available identifiers.
___elements_mapping.title: Elements mapping
